description: Learn fundamental computer skills including file management, browsers, and typing
Stay safe online with password security, threat recognition, and personal info protection
Navigate social media responsibly, understand digital footprints, handle cyberbullying
Discover what AI is, how it works, and its presence in everyday life
Explore AI applications like voice assistants, recommendations, and smart devices
Understand how technology is changing careers and what skills will be valuable

Read, interpret, and work with data, charts, and basic statistics
Master professional email writing, video calls, and online collaboration
Discover career paths, understand your strengths, plan your educational journey
Learn about digital payments, budgeting, and smart money management
Express yourself using digital design, photo editing, and content creation
